Title: Establishes a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Colonie
Summary: Establishes a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Colonie; repeals authorization of program December 31, 2030.
LawCode: Add ยง1180-i, V & T L; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to establishing a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Colonie; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
